trans-unit.source: Updates a bitmap translucency of a layered window

seg-source.mrk: Updates a bitmap translucency of a layered window

target.mrk: Updates a bitmap translucency of a layered window

trans-unit.source: Parameters
Handle to a layered window. A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when its creating.

seg-source.mrk: A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when its creating.

target.mrk: A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when its creating.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the left side of the window.

seg-source.mrk: The new position of the left side of the window.

target.mrk: The new position of the left side of the window.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the top of the window.

seg-source.mrk: The new position of the top of the window.

target.mrk: The new position of the top of the window.

trans-unit.source: Handle to the bitmap that will be set to the layered window.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the bitmap that will be set to the layered window.

target.mrk: Handle to the bitmap that will be set to the layered window.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The alpha transparency value to be used on the entire source bitmap. Default is 255.

seg-source.mrk: The alpha transparency value to be used on the entire source bitmap.

target.mrk: The alpha transparency value to be used on the entire source bitmap.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether to delete the bitmap after updated the window, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether to delete the bitmap after updated the window, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether to delete the bitmap after updated the window, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - Bitmap will be deleted if the function succeeds.

seg-source.mrk: True - Bitmap will be deleted if the function succeeds.

target.mrk: True - Bitmap will be deleted if the function succeeds.

trans-unit.source: False - Do not delete, you must release the bitmap when you are finished using it (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - Do not delete, you must release the bitmap when you are finished using it (Default).

target.mrk: False - Do not delete, you must release the bitmap when you are finished using it (Default).

trans-unit.source: Return Value
True
False
Remarks
For best drawing performance by the layered window and any underlying windows, the layered window should be

seg-source.mrk: For best drawing performance by the layered window and any underlying windows, the layered window should be

target.mrk: For best drawing performance by the layered window and any underlying windows, the layered window should be

trans-unit.source: as small as possible.
If $iX and $iY are both equal to (-1), the current window position will not change.

seg-source.mrk: If $iX and $iY are both equal to (-1), the current window position will not change.

target.mrk: If $iX and $iY are both equal to (-1), the current window position will not change.

trans-unit.source: Example
\Extras\Exclamation.png
Test
.au3
1B
